attributes.action: Move Exmouth seafront cycle path onto the road
attributes.additional_details: Move the cycle path to the other side of Sideshore and additionally the rest of the cycle path onto the road as it is wide enough.
attributes.background: The amount of accidents there are with people being hit by bikes, car doors opening on bikes. I’ve seen people get threatened for crossing the cycle path to cross the road. The path is not wide enough for pedestrians and bikes.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about local cycle paths are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. Find out how to petition your council here: https://eastdevon.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/petitions/introduction/
